name: Snover

evolution.description: Snover can evolve into Abomasnow at level 11 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Frost Tree Pokémon. It lives on snowy mountains. Having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

abilities.name: Snow Warning
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters an outside battle, the weather immediately changes to hail for 5 rounds. In the case of another Pokémon with a similar weather ability, the tie goes to the Pokémon with the highest DEX score.

abilities.name: Soundproof
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sound-based moves.
